attributes.action: Tax aviation fuel in the same was as other fuels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should any of us take any action at all on climate change all the time the government ignores the lack of duty on aviation fuel. All other businesses pay millions in taxes on fuel so why should aviation escape. The idea that you can fly 'to amsterdam for a pound' etc is a nonesense. We are all subsidising those flights through our paying of fuel taxes and if we are to take climate change seriously it HAS to stop.
